citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
An itinerary for overnight travel while exhibiting a regulated animal species was not submitted to the Deputy Administrator.
Not alerting USDA of overnight travel of regulated animals interferes with the ability of inspectors to conduct their
oversight duties and can pose a risk to animals. Itineraries for overnight travel for exhibition of animals must be submitted
at least 2 days prior to travel to APHIS. Correct by 9/1/2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.126(c) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
An itinerary for overnight travel while exhibiting a regulated animal species was not submitted to the Deputy Administrator. 
Not alerting USDA of overnight travel of regulated animals interferes with the ability of inspectors to conduct their 
oversight duties and can pose a risk to animals. Itineraries for overnight travel for exhibition of animals must be submitted 
at least 2 days prior to travel to APHIS. Correct by 9/1/2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
